name: npc_dota_hero_beastmaster
bio_loc:
Karroch was born a child of the stocks. His mother died in childbirth; his father, a farrier for the Last King of Slom, was trampled to death when he was five. Afterward Karroch was indentured to the king's menagerie, where he grew up among all the beasts of the royal court: lions, apes, fell-deer, and things less known, things barely believed in. When the lad was seven, an explorer brought in a beast like none before seen. Dragged before the King in chains, the beast spoke, though its mouth moved not. Its words: a plea for freedom. The King only laughed and ordered the beast perform for his amusement; and when it refused, struck it with the Mad Scepter and ordered it dragged to the stocks.

Over the coming months, the boy Karroch sneaked food and medicinal draughts to the wounded creature, but only managed to slow its deterioration. Wordlessly, the beast spoke to the boy, and over time their bond strengthened until the boy found he could hold up his end of a conversation. He could, in fact, speak now to all the creatures of the King's menagerie. On the night the beast died, a rage came over the boy. He incited the animals of the court to rebel and threw open their cages to set them amok on the palace grounds. The Last King was mauled in the mayhem. In the chaos, one regal stag bowed to the boy who had freed him; and with Beastmaster astride him, leapt the high walls of the estate, and escaped. Now a man, Karroch the Beastmaster has not lost his ability to converse with wild creatures. He has grown into a warrior at one with nature's savagery.
hype_loc: Summoning a poison-spitting boar and a scouting hawk to aid his hunt, Beastmaster never stalks the battlefield unprepared. Chopping through the forest with his axes, his stunning roar opens the way for his allies to devastate enemies.
npe_desc_loc: Summons beasts to aid his hunt

facets.description_loc: Beastmaster attacks faster when his units are nearby.
facets.name: beastmaster_wild_hunt

facets.description_loc: Beastmaster can get a self attack speed and damage amplification boost.
facets.name: beastmaster_beast_mode

abilities.name: beastmaster_wild_axes
abilities.desc_loc: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.
abilities.lore_loc: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.
abilities.scepter_loc: Causes Wild Axes to have no cooldown and can be used again once they come back.

abilities.name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar
abilities.desc_loc: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield. The Boar has a passive poison attack that slows attack and movement speeds.
abilities.lore_loc: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

abilities.name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk
abilities.desc_loc: Beastmaster summons a hawk that circles around Beastmaster and dive-bombs at enemies with a base attack rate of every %hawk_base_attack_interval%s, damaging and rooting them. Attack rate increases with the Hawk's attack speed. Prioritizes heroes.
abilities.lore_loc: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
abilities.shard_loc: Reduces Hawk cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown%s and summons an additional Hawk.

abilities.name: beastmaster_inner_beast
abilities.desc_loc: Untaps the inner fury of Beastmaster and units he controls, passively increasing their attack speed.
abilities.lore_loc: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.
notes_loc: Break disables the passive attack speed bonus.
facets_loc: Attack Speed bonus is increased by the number of units affected by Inner Beast.
Can be activated to increase Beastmaster's attack speed and allow him to apply the Wild Axes damage amplification debuff on his attack target.

abilities.name: beastmaster_drums_of_slom
abilities.desc_loc:
Attacks from Beastmaster or a nearby unit he controls will cause him bang his drum, dealing damage to nearby units and healing Beastmaster and units under his control for a portion of the damage dealt. Every attack decreases the interval between drum hits down to a minimum of %min_drum_hit_interval%s between hits after %max_stacks% attacks. If no attacks are made, the intervals gradually increase.

Using Primal Roar counts as 10/15/20 attacks, based on the current level of Primal Roar.
abilities.lore_loc: Nature's rage is timeless, and for those who know the secrets, it's easy to stir the echoes of ire that rejoiced in the downfall of Slom.

abilities.name: beastmaster_primal_roar
abilities.desc_loc: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain %movement_speed%%% movement speed for 3 seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.
abilities.shard_loc: Causes anyone that attacks a Primal Roar target to deal 1.3x Critical Strike.

abilities.name: beastmaster_rugged
abilities.desc_loc: Beastmaster's melee hero Damage Block Chance is increased from %damage_block_pct_fifty_tooltip%%% to %damage_block_pct_vs_creeps%%% versus non-hero units.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_9
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_damage_amp}% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_5
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_ms} Movespeed Aura to Beastmaster and his units
talents.desc_loc: The Movespeed Aura is global, persists through death, and affects Beastmaster and all units under his control.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_2
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_boar_bonus_damage} Damage to Beastmaster and his units

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_6
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_hp} Max Health Aura to Beastmaster and his units
talents.desc_loc: The Max Health Aura is global, persists through death, and affects Beastmaster and all units under his control.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_wild_axe_cooldown
talents.desc_loc: Axes still must return to Beastmaster before they can be cast again.
